name: team stat with week split only
description: Team stats from plays with week split but no year split. Verifies that team_stats CTE join does not reference a year column when year is not in splits, since the year filter is applied in the CTE WHERE clause.
expected_query: with "base_years" as (SELECT unnest(ARRAY[2023]) as year), "player_years" as (SELECT DISTINCT player.pid, base_years.year FROM player CROSS JOIN base_years WHERE player.pos IN ('WR')), "player_years_weeks" as (SELECT player_years.pid, nfl_year_week_timestamp.year, nfl_year_week_timestamp.week FROM player_years INNER JOIN nfl_year_week_timestamp ON player_years.year = nfl_year_week_timestamp.year WHERE nfl_year_week_timestamp.year = 2023), "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed" as (select "nfl_plays"."off" as "nfl_team", SUM(pass_yds) AS team_pass_yds_from_plays, "nfl_plays"."week" from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_plays"."off", "nfl_plays"."week"), "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed_team_stats" as (select "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed"."nfl_team", sum(t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed.team_pass_yds_from_plays) as team_pass_yds_from_plays, "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed"."week" from "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed" group by "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed"."nfl_team", "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed"."week") select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed_team_stats"."team_pass_yds_from_plays" AS "team_pass_yds_from_plays_0", "player_years_weeks"."week", "player"."pos" from "player" inner join "player_years_weeks" on "player_years_weeks"."pid" = "player"."pid" left join "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed_team_stats" on "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed_team_stats"."nfl_team" = "player"."current_nfl_team" and "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed_team_stats"."week" = "player_years_weeks"."week" and t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed_team_stats.week = player_years_weeks.week where player.pos IN ('WR') group by player.fname, player.lname, "t8d5090666fc7a21265e7ff5e55af6fed_team_stats"."team_pass_yds_from_plays", "player_years_weeks"."week", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
